pages.text: The Resonance Table seems to function as a specialized infusion device. By inputting a resonant crystal and a catalyst, it can create entirely new materials.

pages.title: Operation
pages.text: The table requires two inputs: a primary crystal in the top slot and a catalyst material in the bottom slot. When a valid recipe is detected, the table will begin its infusion process, slowly converting the materials into a new output. The process is entirely self-powered, drawing on ambient resonant energy.
